Jurgen Klopp Sempat Ragu Liverpool Bisa Comeback Lawan Aston Villa
03 Nov 2019, 01:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah pengakuan dibuat oleh Jurgen Klopp. Pelatih Liverpool itu mengakui bahwa ia sempat meragukan timnya bisa meraih comeback melawan Aston Villa.
Pada pertandingan pekan ke 11 EPL musim ini, Liverpool mendapatkan start yang kurang menyenangkan. Mereka tertinggal 1-0 di Villa Park berkat gol Mahmoud Trezeguet.
Hingga menjelang akhir laga, Liverpool kesulitan untuk menembus pertahanan rapat Villa. Namun mereka berhasil membalikkan kedudukan berkat gol dari Andrew Robertson dan Sadio Mane beberapa menit jelang bubaran.
Klopp mengaku sangat gembira timnya bisa meraih comeback di laga kali ini. "Ini adalah hal terbaik yang bisa terjadi di sepakbola," beber Klopp yang dikutip Liverpool Echo.

Jurgen Klopp Could Doubt Liverpool Can Comeback Against Aston Villa
Nov 3 2019, 01:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A confession was made by Jurgen Klopp. The Liverpool coach admitted he doubted his team could make a comeback against Aston Villa.
In the EPL Week 11 match of the season, Liverpool got an unpleasant start. They left 1-0 at Villa Park thanks to Mahmoud Trezeguet's goal.
Until towards the end of the fight, Liverpool had difficulty penetrating the defense of the Villa meeting. But they managed to reverse the position thanks to goals from Andrew Robertson and Sadio Mane a few minutes before dispersal.
Klopp said he was very happy that his team could make a comeback in this match. "This is the best thing that can happen in football," Klopp was quoted as saying by Liverpool Echo.
